statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 5 \\ 14 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -36 \\ -12 \\ -36 \\ 6 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -106 \\ -37 \\ -106 \\ 21 \\ 32 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
